amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Not more than $200,000,000 of the funds provided by title IX under the heading "Operation and Maintenance, Army" may be available for the Commander's Emergency Response Program, and the amount otherwise provided under such heading is hereby reduced by $200,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the use of funds to not more than $200,000,000, provided by title IX under the heading "Operation and Maintenance, Army", may be available for the Commander's Emergency Response Program. Also, the amount otherwise provided under such heading is reduced by $200,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 257 (Roll no. 521).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 257 (Roll no. 521).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Welch.
